actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Food and Drug Administration to conduct a study of the health effects of toxic contamination of fish in Santa Monica Bay, California.

summary.text: Directs the Commissioner of the Food and Drug Administration to evaluate the health effects of toxic contamination of fish in Santa Monica Bay, California, reporting the results to the Congress within six months of this Act's enactment.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Food and Drug Administration to conduct a study of the health effects of toxic contamination of fish in Santa Monica Bay, California.
